author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF WESTERN VIRGINIA...
summary:
...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF WESTERN VIRGINIA...
 As of 11:00 PM EDT Thu Aug 8
 the center of Debby was located near 36.2, -80.2
 with movement NNE at 26 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.
